entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
